Name: Final Hope
About the game: Final Hope is a Battle Royale game with doomsday as the background. Game features description: * Each battlefield can accommodate up to 500 players at the same time Each character can learn up to 128 combat skills and can ambush with poison gas and bomb traps. Everything is only to kill all players on the battlefield!! * Each server group can accommodate 12,000 players for online interaction. Contains player community interaction functions such as teaming, friends, marriage, guilds, stores, and various channels. * Combat calculations are all handled by the server. Prevent cheating. All roles and battlefield information are present in the server. All calculations involving movement and combat are performed in the server. Give you the most fair escape and kill. * Real Battle Royale game, the player character will likely be permanent death. Unique system of injury deaths, injuries by the light and heavy. Finally, it is more likely to lead to permanent death of the character. Cannot log in to the game anymore!! Give players unprecedented excitement Battle Royale! *Play as a doctor or a murderer, as a hero or a demon. It's up to you. In this doomsday virtual world, You can learn medical, surgical and other life-saving skills, You can also learn killing skills such as dismemberment, beheading, and heart-digging. You can also learn assassination techniques such as trap installation, explosive agents, etc. 128 kinds of skills allow you to freely play the role you want to play. * Presenting a chaotic battlefield, unlimited killing and love. In addition to killing, the game offers a variety of interactive functions such as kissing and hugging. Most of the interactions that can be done in the real world can be done in games. Including stroking, oral sex, masturbation, sex in various positions, etc., without gender and other restrictions. * Battlefield configuration of 100 AI artificial intelligence players. Each AI player has 128 personality traits. And remember social interaction with 1024 players Contains hatred and friendship, etc., will accept the player's love and interact with the player's love. Let every player can enjoy the killing pleasure at any time. Can have a lover who never changes. Without any stored value system, All store coins are obtained by searching and killing monsters in the game. Freely traded by players. players can freely sex and kill each other. There are no hypocritical moral restrictions. No need to provide identity information to log in to the world, The server does not record the player login ip. Not connecting to the real world. Support MOD creation system, the world landscape and character appearance can be created and modified by the player. A truly player-centric virtual world-meta universe Invite you to experience it, The chaotic world of the end of the world...
